claim: Shahid Kapoor was a talent judge on a singing competition show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In addition to acting , Kapoor supports charities , hosts award ceremonies , and has featured as a talent judge on the dance reality show Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa Reloaded  (  2015  )  .

claim: Shahid Kapoor was a talent judge on a singing competition show.
